page.title: 02Roads in our area.
page.content: The roads show a{contrast}between quiet{residential}streets and busier {urban routes}eg.Hagley Rd. Hagley Rd and Wolverhampton Rd both provide{commuter routes}from the residential districts of Quinton and Halesowen, and{access}to the M5 at junctions 2 and 3. The route via Broadway and Norman Rd. takes commuters from the west into Smethwick and N.W. of B'ham while the old coaching highway of George Rd, Pottery Rd to Abbey Rd allows a short cut from W'ton Rd to the same area. Many are{wide and tree lined}with a variety of housing (c.1890-1970's) and many paving stones are being replaced by tarmac to reduce accidents by raised stones and expense. The main{shopping roads}are Bearwood Rd through into Waterloo Rd and Capehill.
